menu.Debug=Debug
menu.SubCore=SubCore
menu.SubCoreMemorySize=SubCore MemorySize
menu.SubCoreDebug=SubCore Debug
menu.UploadSpeed=UploadSpeed

############## Spresense BOARD ##############
spresense.name=Spresense

spresense.vid.0=0x10C4
spresense.pid.0=0xEA60

spresense.upload.tool=spresense-tools
spresense.upload.speed=115200
spresense.upload.resetmethod=ck
spresense.upload.maximum_size=786432
spresense.upload.maximum_data_size=786432
spresense.upload.wait_for_upload_port=true
spresense.serial.disableDTR=false
spresense.serial.disableRTS=true

spresense.bootloader.tool=spresense-tools

spresense.build.mcu=spresense
spresense.build.f_cpu=156000000L
spresense.build.board=spresense_ast
spresense.build.core=spresense
spresense.build.variant=spresense
spresense.build.debug=
spresense.build.libpath=
spresense.build.stack=-Wl,--defsym,__stack=_vectors+{upload.maximum_size}
spresense.build.ldscript=-T{variant.path}/ramconfig.ld

spresense.menu.Debug.Disabled=Disabled
spresense.menu.Debug.Disabled.build.debug=
spresense.menu.Debug.Disabled.build.type=release
spresense.menu.Debug.Disabled.build.root={runtime.tools.spresense-sdk.path}/spresense
spresense.menu.Debug.Disabled.build.kernel={build.root}/{build.type}
spresense.menu.Debug.Disabled.build.libpath={build.kernel}/prebuilt

spresense.menu.Debug.Enabled=Enabled
spresense.menu.Debug.Enabled.build.debug=-DBRD_DEBUG
spresense.menu.Debug.Enabled.build.type=debug
spresense.menu.Debug.Enabled.build.root={runtime.tools.spresense-sdk.path}/spresense
spresense.menu.Debug.Enabled.build.kernel={build.root}/{build.type}
spresense.menu.Debug.Enabled.build.libpath={build.kernel}/prebuilt

spresense.menu.UploadSpeed.115200=115200
spresense.menu.UploadSpeed.115200.upload.speed=
spresense.menu.UploadSpeed.230400=230400
spresense.menu.UploadSpeed.230400.upload.speed=-b 230400
spresense.menu.UploadSpeed.460800=460800
spresense.menu.UploadSpeed.460800.upload.speed=-b 460800
spresense.menu.UploadSpeed.500000=500000
spresense.menu.UploadSpeed.500000.upload.speed=-b 500000
spresense.menu.UploadSpeed.576000=576000
spresense.menu.UploadSpeed.576000.upload.speed=-b 576000
spresense.menu.UploadSpeed.921600=921600
spresense.menu.UploadSpeed.921600.upload.speed=-b 921600
spresense.menu.UploadSpeed.1000000=1000000
spresense.menu.UploadSpeed.1000000.upload.speed=-b 1000000
spresense.menu.UploadSpeed.1152000=1152000
spresense.menu.UploadSpeed.1152000.upload.speed=-b 1152000

############## Spresense BOARD for SubCore ##############
spresense_sub.name=Spresense SubCore

spresense_sub.vid.0=0x10C4
spresense_sub.pid.0=0xEA60

spresense_sub.upload.tool=spresense-tools
spresense_sub.upload.speed=115200
spresense_sub.upload.resetmethod=ck
spresense_sub.upload.wait_for_upload_port=true
spresense_sub.serial.disableDTR=false
spresense_sub.serial.disableRTS=true

spresense_sub.bootloader.tool=spresense-tools

spresense_sub.build.mcu=spresense
spresense_sub.build.f_cpu=156000000L
spresense_sub.build.board=spresense_ast
spresense_sub.build.core=spresense
spresense_sub.build.variant=spresense_sub
spresense_sub.build.debug=
spresense_sub.build.libpath=
spresense_sub.build.stack=-Wl,--defsym,__stack=_vectors+{upload.maximum_size}
spresense_sub.build.ldscript=-T{variant.path}/ramconfig.ld

spresense_sub.menu.SubCore.Sub1=SubCore 1
spresense_sub.menu.SubCore.Sub2=SubCore 2
spresense_sub.menu.SubCore.Sub3=SubCore 3
spresense_sub.menu.SubCore.Sub4=SubCore 4
spresense_sub.menu.SubCore.Sub5=SubCore 5

spresense_sub.menu.SubCore.Sub1.index=1
spresense_sub.menu.SubCore.Sub2.index=2
spresense_sub.menu.SubCore.Sub3.index=3
spresense_sub.menu.SubCore.Sub4.index=4
spresense_sub.menu.SubCore.Sub5.index=5

spresense_sub.menu.SubCoreDebug.Disabled=Disabled
spresense_sub.menu.SubCoreDebug.Disabled.build.debug=
spresense_sub.menu.SubCoreDebug.Disabled.build.type=subcore-release
spresense_sub.menu.SubCoreDebug.Disabled.build.root={runtime.tools.spresense-sdk.path}/spresense
spresense_sub.menu.SubCoreDebug.Disabled.build.kernel={build.root}/{build.type}
spresense_sub.menu.SubCoreDebug.Disabled.build.libpath={build.kernel}/prebuilt
spresense_sub.menu.SubCoreDebug.Disabled.build.extra_flags=-DSUBCORE={index}

spresense_sub.menu.SubCoreDebug.Enabled=Enabled
spresense_sub.menu.SubCoreDebug.Enabled.build.debug=-DBRD_DEBUG
spresense_sub.menu.SubCoreDebug.Enabled.build.type=subcore-debug
spresense_sub.menu.SubCoreDebug.Enabled.build.root={runtime.tools.spresense-sdk.path}/spresense
spresense_sub.menu.SubCoreDebug.Enabled.build.kernel={build.root}/{build.type}
spresense_sub.menu.SubCoreDebug.Enabled.build.libpath={build.kernel}/prebuilt
spresense_sub.menu.SubCoreDebug.Enabled.build.extra_flags=-DSUBCORE={index}

spresense_sub.menu.SubCoreMemorySize.128KB=128 KB
spresense_sub.menu.SubCoreMemorySize.256KB=256 KB
spresense_sub.menu.SubCoreMemorySize.384KB=384 KB
spresense_sub.menu.SubCoreMemorySize.512KB=512 KB
spresense_sub.menu.SubCoreMemorySize.640KB=640 KB
spresense_sub.menu.SubCoreMemorySize.768KB=768 KB

spresense_sub.menu.SubCoreMemorySize.128KB.upload.maximum_size=131072
spresense_sub.menu.SubCoreMemorySize.256KB.upload.maximum_size=262144
spresense_sub.menu.SubCoreMemorySize.384KB.upload.maximum_size=393216
spresense_sub.menu.SubCoreMemorySize.512KB.upload.maximum_size=524288
spresense_sub.menu.SubCoreMemorySize.640KB.upload.maximum_size=655360
spresense_sub.menu.SubCoreMemorySize.768KB.upload.maximum_size=786432

spresense_sub.menu.SubCoreMemorySize.128KB.upload.maximum_data_size=131072
spresense_sub.menu.SubCoreMemorySize.256KB.upload.maximum_data_size=262144
spresense_sub.menu.SubCoreMemorySize.384KB.upload.maximum_data_size=393216
spresense_sub.menu.SubCoreMemorySize.512KB.upload.maximum_data_size=524288
spresense_sub.menu.SubCoreMemorySize.640KB.upload.maximum_data_size=655360
spresense_sub.menu.SubCoreMemorySize.768KB.upload.maximum_data_size=786432

spresense_sub.menu.SubCore.Sub1.recipe.objcopy.hex.pattern="{runtime.tools.spresense-tools.path}/mkspk/{runtime.os}/mkspk" -c 2 "{build.path}/{build.project_name}.elf" sub{index} "{build.path}/{build.project_name}.spk"
spresense_sub.menu.SubCore.Sub2.recipe.objcopy.hex.pattern="{runtime.tools.spresense-tools.path}/mkspk/{runtime.os}/mkspk" -c 2 "{build.path}/{build.project_name}.elf" sub{index} "{build.path}/{build.project_name}.spk"
spresense_sub.menu.SubCore.Sub3.recipe.objcopy.hex.pattern="{runtime.tools.spresense-tools.path}/mkspk/{runtime.os}/mkspk" -c 2 "{build.path}/{build.project_name}.elf" sub{index} "{build.path}/{build.project_name}.spk"
spresense_sub.menu.SubCore.Sub4.recipe.objcopy.hex.pattern="{runtime.tools.spresense-tools.path}/mkspk/{runtime.os}/mkspk" -c 2 "{build.path}/{build.project_name}.elf" sub{index} "{build.path}/{build.project_name}.spk"
spresense_sub.menu.SubCore.Sub5.recipe.objcopy.hex.pattern="{runtime.tools.spresense-tools.path}/mkspk/{runtime.os}/mkspk" -c 2 "{build.path}/{build.project_name}.elf" sub{index} "{build.path}/{build.project_name}.spk"

spresense_sub.menu.SubCore.Sub1.recipe.objcopy.hex.pattern.windows="{runtime.tools.spresense-tools.path}/mkspk/{runtime.os}/mkspk.exe" -c 2 "{build.path}/{build.project_name}.elf" sub{index} "{build.path}/{build.project_name}.spk"
spresense_sub.menu.SubCore.Sub2.recipe.objcopy.hex.pattern.windows="{runtime.tools.spresense-tools.path}/mkspk/{runtime.os}/mkspk.exe" -c 2 "{build.path}/{build.project_name}.elf" sub{index} "{build.path}/{build.project_name}.spk"
spresense_sub.menu.SubCore.Sub3.recipe.objcopy.hex.pattern.windows="{runtime.tools.spresense-tools.path}/mkspk/{runtime.os}/mkspk.exe" -c 2 "{build.path}/{build.project_name}.elf" sub{index} "{build.path}/{build.project_name}.spk"
spresense_sub.menu.SubCore.Sub4.recipe.objcopy.hex.pattern.windows="{runtime.tools.spresense-tools.path}/mkspk/{runtime.os}/mkspk.exe" -c 2 "{build.path}/{build.project_name}.elf" sub{index} "{build.path}/{build.project_name}.spk"
spresense_sub.menu.SubCore.Sub5.recipe.objcopy.hex.pattern.windows="{runtime.tools.spresense-tools.path}/mkspk/{runtime.os}/mkspk.exe" -c 2 "{build.path}/{build.project_name}.elf" sub{index} "{build.path}/{build.project_name}.spk"

spresense_sub.menu.UploadSpeed.115200=115200
spresense_sub.menu.UploadSpeed.115200.upload.speed=
spresense_sub.menu.UploadSpeed.230400=230400
spresense_sub.menu.UploadSpeed.230400.upload.speed=-b 230400
spresense_sub.menu.UploadSpeed.460800=460800
spresense_sub.menu.UploadSpeed.460800.upload.speed=-b 460800
spresense_sub.menu.UploadSpeed.500000=500000
spresense_sub.menu.UploadSpeed.500000.upload.speed=-b 500000
spresense_sub.menu.UploadSpeed.576000=576000
spresense_sub.menu.UploadSpeed.576000.upload.speed=-b 576000
spresense_sub.menu.UploadSpeed.921600=921600
spresense_sub.menu.UploadSpeed.921600.upload.speed=-b 921600
spresense_sub.menu.UploadSpeed.1000000=1000000
spresense_sub.menu.UploadSpeed.1000000.upload.speed=-b 1000000
spresense_sub.menu.UploadSpeed.1152000=1152000
spresense_sub.menu.UploadSpeed.1152000.upload.speed=-b 1152000
